traits.Indomitable (3/Day): The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.
traits.Survivor: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

options.Weapon Attack: The warlord makes a weapon attack.
options.Command Ally: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.
options.Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions): The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord's next turn.
